name: Google
description: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company focusing on search engine technology, online advertising, cloud computing, computer software, quantum computing, e-commerce, artificial intelligence, and consumer electronics.
extendedDescription: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company focusing on search engine technology, online advertising, cloud computing, computer software, quantum computing, e-commerce, artificial intelligence, and consumer electronics.

Founded in 1998 by Larry Page and Sergey Brin while they were Ph.D. students at Stanford University, Google has grown to offer a wide range of products beyond its core search engine, including Gmail, Google Maps, Google Drive, and YouTube.

The company's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful. Google is a subsidiary of Alphabet Inc., which was created in 2015 as part of a corporate restructuring.
industry: Technology, Internet, Cloud Computing, Artificial Intelligence

name: Microsoft
description: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology corporation which produces computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services.
extendedDescription: Microsoft is a multinational technology company that develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services.

Founded in 1975 by Bill Gates and Paul Allen, Microsoft has grown to become one of the most valuable companies in the world. The company's flagship products include Windows operating system, Microsoft Office suite, and Azure cloud services.

Under CEO Satya Nadella's leadership since 2014, Microsoft has pivoted to focus on cloud computing and artificial intelligence while maintaining its strong position in productivity software and operating systems.
The company is also known for its hardware products including Xbox gaming consoles, Surface line of laptops and tablets, and more recently, mixed reality headsets with HoloLens.

culture.learningOpportunities: Extensive learning resources and certification programs

benefits.leaves: Generous paid time off and parental leave

careerGrowth.promotionOpportunities: Merit-based growth with clear career paths

name: Amazon
description: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.
extendedDescription: Amazon is a multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. Founded by Jeff Bezos in 1994 as an online bookstore, Amazon has expanded to become one of the world's most valuable companies and a leader in multiple technology sectors.

From its humble beginnings, Amazon has grown into the world's largest online marketplace, AI assistant provider, and cloud computing platform. The company has revolutionized retail with its vast selection, competitive pricing, and efficient delivery systems, including Amazon Prime which offers same-day or next-day delivery in many areas.

Amazon Web Services (AWS), launched in 2006, has become the world's leading cloud platform, providing infrastructure services to businesses of all sizes, from startups to large enterprises. AWS powers a significant portion of the internet, including major websites and applications.

culture.teamEnvironment: Results-oriented with focus on customer obsession

name: Apple
description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company that specializes in consumer electronics, software and online services.
extendedDescription: Founded in 1976 by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne, Apple has grown to become one of the world's most valuable companies and a leading provider of consumer electronics, software, and online services.
The company's products include the iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, Apple TV, and Apple Music.
Apple's services include Apple Music, Apple TV+, Apple Arcade, Apple News+, and Apple Cloud Services.

name: Squarespace
description: Squarespace is an American website building and hosting company which is based in New York City. It provides software as a service for website building and hosting, and allows users to use pre-built website templates and drag-and-drop elements to create websites.
headquarters: New York City, New York, United States

name: Tata Consultancy Services
description: TCS is India's largest IT services company and one of the largest multinational companies globally.

culture.workLifeBalance: Good work-life balance with flexible hours

benefits.leaves: Paid time off, sick leave, and parental leave

name: Infosys
description: Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting, enabling clients in more than 56 countries to navigate their digital transformation.

culture.workLifeBalance: Structured work hours with good balance; varies by project and client
culture.learningOpportunities: Extensive through Infosys Learning Platform, certifications, and training programs
culture.teamEnvironment: Global teams with diverse culture; collaborative work environment

interviewProcess.typicalDuration: 2-3 weeks for experienced professionals; longer for campus recruitment
tips: Strong understanding of programming fundamentals for technical roles

name: Accenture
description: Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security.

culture.workLifeBalance: Flexible working hours and remote work options, though varies by project
culture.learningOpportunities: Continuous learning through Accenture Connected Learning and specialized academies
culture.teamEnvironment: Diverse and inclusive workplace with global teaming opportunities

name: Wipro
description: Wipro Limited is a leading global information technology, consulting and business process services company.

name: Tesla
description: Tesla, Inc. is an American multinational automotive and clean energy company that designs and manufactures electric vehicles, battery energy storage, solar panels and roof tiles, and related products and services.

values: Accelerating the world's transition to sustainable energy

tips: Highlight ability to work in fast-paced environments

name: Peloton
description: Peloton Interactive, Inc. is an American exercise equipment and media company based in New York City. Peloton's main products include internet-connected stationary bicycles and treadmills that enable monthly subscribers to remotely participate in classes via streaming media.
extendedDescription: Peloton Interactive, Inc. is an American exercise equipment and media company that was founded in 2012.
The company's primary offerings are internet-connected stationary bicycles and treadmills that enable monthly subscribers to remotely participate in classes via streaming media.
Peloton has revolutionized the fitness industry with its combination of high-quality hardware, immersive digital content, and community features.
The company went public in 2019 and experienced significant growth during the COVID-19 pandemic as home fitness solutions became increasingly popular.
headquarters: New York City, New York, United States
